text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0hbG9C6bhZE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0hbG9C6bhZE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On one\nof my Chemical tankers ( aging one ) I heard a soft timid knock on my door at\nsea .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually\nI have the gut feeling what this could be about\u2014 someone wanting a tete e tete\nwith Captain in private. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\nopened the door and there I saw the entire Engine Officers ( except Chief\nEngineer ) including Electrical Officer &nbsp;standing with a nervous look.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\ncalled them in and made them sit . &nbsp;I\nsend the junior most Engineer back to the ECR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nSecond Engineer talked on behalf of his team &nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c Sir\nwe don\u2019t want to work under this Chief Engineer. &nbsp;&nbsp;We are doing \u201cfire fighting \u201c every single\nday with break downs galore. &nbsp;We are afraid\nfor our lives now . &nbsp;The engine crew too wants us to meet you \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I recapitulated\nin my mann mandir. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes , I\nhad a Chief Engineer with 18 years of wearing 4 stripes. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">His\ntechnical knowledge despite his massive seniority was zilch. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had\nbreakdowns every single day since I joined the ship for the past 3 months. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not minor ones\u2014major ones. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generator\ncon rods shattering the 4 stroke engine entablature, spraying black lub oil all\nover the engine room, &nbsp;main engine\nexhaust valves shattering, &nbsp;&nbsp;boiler furnace &nbsp;explosion, &nbsp;main engine reversing failures,&nbsp; main engine piston ring shattering , heavy\noil inside automation control air system, economiser fire, main engine cylinder\nhead getting lifted due to dribbling nozzles, &nbsp;purifier water carry over , &nbsp;AC/ fridge room failures &nbsp;, turbocharger problems, &nbsp;boiler ACC problems &nbsp;etc etc. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only\nmarine engineers can figure out what all above means.&nbsp; This is more than firefighting. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is moving from CRISIS to CRISIS to\nCRISIS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">Engineers set a problem right at midnight have late dinner and a bath-- &nbsp;as soon as they are tucked in under the blanket- another crisis strikes.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At\nsome stage the morale gets crushed , the team gets burnt out-- and this is what happened\n. &nbsp; Self preservation now becomes paramount.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nEngineers came to the Captain, not Chief Engineer for a roof over their heads .\n&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Extra-ordinary circumstances requires\nextra ordinary solutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Total\ndisgrace !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uc8rYr1iNwg/WJqVb8roYPI/AAAAAAABQp0/n2QVAQz3UgoI5gh-Vskt9oObiKqQJ6mbQCLcB/s1600/fig3S-21.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uc8rYr1iNwg/WJqVb8roYPI/AAAAAAABQp0/n2QVAQz3UgoI5gh-Vskt9oObiKqQJ6mbQCLcB/s640/fig3S-21.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmarine engineering world do not even know that conrods of a 4 stroke engine\nmust </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PUSH and not PULL.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis how stupid the entire engineering world at sea (&nbsp; hundreds of thousands of engineers over the\nyears ) , the IMO </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>cunt </b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">bosses and Hi Fi manufacturers are . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">It\ntakes a deck boy named Vadakayil to tell this TRUTH </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/AJXdEe5-3k4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/AJXdEe5-3k4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kYvRh6mm37E/WJqWCyFSJPI/AAAAAAABQp8/GXhl6coisfAMJgln1nY7q7FaCdJx4AzrACLcB/s1600/conroAAd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kYvRh6mm37E/WJqWCyFSJPI/AAAAAAABQp8/GXhl6coisfAMJgln1nY7q7FaCdJx4AzrACLcB/s640/conroAAd.jpg\" width=\"454\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ncompany inherited this panvati ship from another company where all Koreans were\nsacked enmasse for excessive loss of hire ( time charter ) breakdowns . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since\nOur company took over I was the 4<sup>th</sup> Captain in two months\u2014the first\nthree Captains ran away or were sacked. &nbsp;Two Chief Engineers were sacked and one second\nEngineer ran away. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nsecond Engineer pretended to faint in the Engine room, when sea water in bilges\nhit the engine flywheel spraying water , causing him to be removed in Suez\nCanal..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moral\nwas at the lowest ebb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\nasked \u201c What was the last straw \u2013which broke the camel\u2019s back?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nelectrical officer butted in \u201c Sir, when the Genny conrod broke, we called\nChief Engineer first and then you. &nbsp;You\ncame down to the Engine Control room in 120 seconds and gave firm orders which\nprevented a major explosion in the whole Engine room &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;. &nbsp;Chief Engineer did NOT come down for 25\nminutes.. &nbsp;we wont have this anymore\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\nremembered -- &nbsp;Yes\u2014I did NOT see the\nChief Engineer in the engine room . I talked to him by phone later giving him\nfurther instructions\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To cut\na long story short , I laid down engine watchkeeping procedures fresh\u2014firm in\nthe knowledge that prevention is better than cure <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis the process verbal of that meeting --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>GETTING\nOUR ACT TOGETHER IN ENGINE ROOM</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">GENERAL:</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1)BOILER\nGUAGE GLASSES TO BE BLOWN THROUGH EVERY WATCH (HERE ONCE A WEEK-- POT . ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2)HO/\nDO SERVICE TANKS DRAINED EVERY WATCH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3)AIR\nBOTTLES DRAINED EVERY WATCH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4)BOILER\nAND JACKET COOLING WATER TO BE TESTED EVERY DAY AND CHEMICALY DOSED\nACCORDINGLY.&nbsp; ENSURE NO JCW LEAKS. (HERE\nTWICE A WEEK )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5)ALL\nBILGES TO BE PUMPED OUT THROUGH OWS. NUMBERED PLASTIC SEALS TO BE PUT ON DIRECT\nOVERBOARD VALVES AND NUMBERS TO BE REPORTED EVERY MONTH END AND IN INTERNAL\nAUDIT / SUPERINTENDENTS REPORT FOR RECORD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6)INSULATION\nOF IDLE MOTORS TO BE CHECKED PRIOR STARTING. ( 10 MEGA OHMS )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7)ME/\nAE FO/ LO FILTERS TO BE BACK WASHED EVERY WATCH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8)ALL\nACTIVATED ALARMS TO BE ENTERED IN DEDICATED ALARM REGISTER AND REMEDY LOGGED.\nCHENGR TO SIGN THIS LOG DAILY. ( NOT THERE HERE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">TAKING\nOVER WATCH:</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1)CHECK\nWASTE OIL TANK LEVEL AND DRAIN OFF WATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2)CHECK\nMAIN ENGINE AND AE HEADER TANK LEVELS. RECORD QUANTITY OF WATER ADDED. (\nQUANTITY OF WATER NOT RECORDED HERE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3)CHECK\nLEVEL OF FUEL VALVE COOLING SYSTEM HEADER TANK. ( NOT THERE HERE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4)STERN\nTUBE HEADER TANK LEVEL CHECK,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5)CHECK\nTURBO CHARGER OIL LEVEL AND PRESSURE DIFFERENTIAL. ( NOT LOGGED )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6)AE\nCOOLER PRESSURE DROP CHECK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7)CHECK\nMECYL DAY TANK LEVEL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8)DRAIN\nWATER FROM ALL FUEL TANKS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9)CHECK\nFUEL LINE FILTER DIFFERENTIAL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10)CHECK\nME GOVERNOR OIL LEVEL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11)ENSURE\nSCAVENGE AND DRAIN COOLER DRAINS ARE CLEAR. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "233", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5630883461513215262/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "909403194550310666", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-02-04T03:44:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-06-24T16:45:17+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTI5ODM4OTE3ODkyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/909403194550310666", "title": "Justice cannot be blind , NATURAL JUSTICE shall be inherent , CONTEXT shall be the perimeter, part 12 \u2013 Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 11, BELOW---</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_31.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_31.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-J3VWikp1dFI/WJUAxjqoBOI/AAAAAAABQnk/Wspl9EB2hzciATYxXAUk4v66griRJHxqwCLcB/s1600/115E67085-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"392\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-J3VWikp1dFI/WJUAxjqoBOI/AAAAAAABQnk/Wspl9EB2hzciATYxXAUk4v66griRJHxqwCLcB/s640/115E67085-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Nyaya Panchayat is a\nsystem of dispute resolution at village level in India.&nbsp; This is a system which has been going on for\nthousands of years still it was stopped by Trojan Horse foreign funded NGOs ,\nbenami media and Collegium judiciary nexus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unconstitutional Collegium\njudiciary new plays god by using the PIL route.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/contempt-of-court-criminal-misuse-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/contempt-of-court-criminal-misuse-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 7 parts of the\npost below---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya panchayats are be\nendowed with functions based on broad principles of natural justice and can\ntend to remain proceedurally as simple as possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is one Nyaya Panchayat\nfor every three or four villages. Each village Panchayat elects a member to the\nNyaya Panchayat. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nyaya Panchayat is\nheaded by a village Sarpanch. &nbsp;It hears\nminor civil and criminal cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya Panchayat is a simple\nsystem of dispute resolution at village level in India. &nbsp;&nbsp;India has had a long history of resolving\ndisputes through the mediation of respected village elders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya panchayats guided\nby local traditions, culture and behavioural pattern of the village community\ninstill confidence in the people towards the administration of justice. These\nvillage elders know the pulse of the people and have hindsight.&nbsp; They know the rotten eggs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would dispose of a\nlarge number of cases and thus relieve the burden of regular courts.&nbsp; They would succeed in getting a large number\nof cases compromised through peaceful conciliation using principles of natural\njustice.&nbsp; &nbsp;Here the justice is NOT blind , the way Jew\nRothschild corrupted our regular judiciary..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The villagers in general\nwould be satisfied with the administration of justice obtaining in village or\npanchayat courts and that the decisions of these courts on the whole would do\nsubstantial justice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Appeals and revisions\nfrom these decisions would be small in number.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There should be speedy\nand cheap disposal of cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The litigants and\nwitnesses who are mostly agriculturists can conveniently attend the courts and\nthus there would be no interference with agricultural activities in the\nvillage. They don\u2019t have to travel far. &nbsp;&nbsp;Witnesses are treated with respect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panchayat could\nbring justice nearer to the villager without involving the expenditure which\nwould otherwise have to be incurred in establishing regular courts, hiring\nexpensive lawyers who are usually JUDASES &nbsp;in cahoots with the lawyer of the opposite\ncamp..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchayat would have an\neducative value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Local courts acquainted\nwith the customs of the neighbourhood and nuances of the local idiom are better\nable to understand why certain things are said or done. All conversations are\nin local dialect or language not some alien language . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people concerned\ncan talk to the \u201cjudges\u201d . There is NO \u201ccontempt of court\u201d for faalthu reason\nlike \u201cstanding on one leg \u201c. &nbsp;The\naudience is NOT alien but people in the village who have a stake .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People in a village are\nso closely known to each other that the parties to a dispute would not be able\nto conceal or produce false evidence easily and those who tell lies before the\nnyaya panchayat face the risk of being looked down upon and even boycotted or\nex-communicated by others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchas being drawn\nfrom among simple village folk strive at decisions which are fair and at the\nsame time consistent with the peculiar conditions of the parties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchayats, the age-old\ninstitution has found new vigour with the introduction of the 73rd Amendment to\nthe Constitution, and most accordingly to be considered another pillar in the\nedifice that symbolizes justice.&nbsp; This is\ndespite the Collegium judiciary, Benami media and Foreign funded NGOs trying\ntheir best to discredit this beautiful traditional system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strengthening the\ninstitution of Panchayats and empowering people at the grass-root level to\nresolve their disputes amicably would solve many of the problems that is faced\nby conventional justice dispensation machinery in its attempts to percolate to\nthe lowest levels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This would provide a,\nsolution to the problems of access to those living in remote regions and\nilliterate tribals .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-shNFxAI87LQ/WJUB9qotDOI/AAAAAAABQnw/xc9z9WB-ruILAainOH2VJCkl64JnxBYngCLcB/s1600/WW3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"430\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-shNFxAI87LQ/WJUB9qotDOI/AAAAAAABQnw/xc9z9WB-ruILAainOH2VJCkl64JnxBYngCLcB/s640/WW3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rationale behind\nsetting up the Nyaya Panchayat are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fair justice system<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Democratic\ndecentralisation,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Easy access to justice,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Speedy disposal of\ncases,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Inexpensive justice\nsystem,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Revival of traditional village\ncommunity life,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Combination of judicial\nsystem and local self government, <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Reduction in pressure\non Civil Courts.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Procedure followed in\nnyaya panchayats is very simple and informal. The procedure codes like Code of\nCivil Procedure, Criminal Procedure Code and Indian Evidence Act apply to the\nnyaya panchyats,&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, they have power to\ncall witnesses and the parties for recording their evidence&nbsp; or producing any relevant document or fact.\nUnlike courts, they have the power to&nbsp; investigate\nthe facts to find out the truth and at the same time they have the power to\npunish for its REAL contempt.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lawyers cannot appear\nbefore a nyaya panchyat in any of its proceedings.&nbsp; Thank god !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN MINOR CASES WHY DO\nWE REQUIRE LAWYERS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The advantages of nyaya\npanchayats over the regular courts are priceless\u2026</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nprovide justice at the door steps for the village folks.&nbsp; &nbsp;They\nprovide relief to the ordinary courts as they lift the part of burden of\njudicial work on their shoulders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a way, they are emerged on solution to the\nproblem of mounting arrears of cases before the courts. Local culture and traditions\nare not kicked on the teeth . Panchayat System has a great educative value for\nthe villagers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disadvantages of nyaya\npanchayats ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TAKE CARE OF THIS \u2013 &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE\nALL RULINGS UNDER VIDEO CAM , TO FIGURE OUT IF ANY CORRUPTION IS GOING ON&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till our backlog clears\ndo NOT overburden our justice system with traffic challan cases. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All petty cases and ego massage cases should\nbe taken out of this system.&nbsp; &nbsp;Even petty criminal cases caused by extreme\npoverty should go out.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Courts should be dealing with serious criminal offences,\nnot with petty cases.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There must be more labs\nfor DNA evidence .&nbsp; There must be secrecy\n\u2013 &nbsp;to prevent corruption lab operators\nmust not know names . &nbsp;There must be code\nnumbers.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice delayed is\njustice denied is an axiom that all of us in India understand as we see\nthousands of cases hanging on without justice for decades.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who abused the system and kept breadwinner\nundertrials in jail for too long must be punished<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The irony is striking\nwhen in many cases, the judgment arrives after the petitioner has died. &nbsp;It is NOT fair to trouble a man because his\ngrandfather who died ( long ago ) &nbsp;shot a\ndeer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eighty percent of the\nbacklog is in nine mainline states with very large populations.. Those who\ndeliberately delay cases must be penalized and those filing false\naffidavits&nbsp; and pompous people seeking\nEGO MASSAGE should be severely prosecuted and fined heavily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Media whore Rajdeep\nSardesai wants 100 crores .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is he ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some kind of modern maryada\npurush ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Puja culture ? &nbsp;How about namaaz culture ? font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FRIVOLOUS EGO MASSAGE\nCASES MUST BE CLOSED,&nbsp; EVEN IF ONE EGO\nLADEN ULTERIOR MOTIVED PARTY DOES NOT AGREE.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I HAVE SEEN ONE NCP\nPOLITICIAN ( &nbsp;SUPER RICH AND POWERFUL\u2014 HIS\nFATHER WAS A PAUPER&nbsp; ) ON A TV\nDEBATE.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ONE DEBATE MEMBER SAID A\nBITTER TRUTH -- SOMETHING, TO SAVE THE WATAN,&nbsp;\nWHICH DID NOT SUIT THIS CORRUPT MINISTER PERSONALLY&nbsp; .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IMMEDIATELY THE\nMINISTER&nbsp; WARNS THIS MAN&nbsp; \u201d I WILL CONSULT MY TEAM OF LAWYERS AND SUE\nYOU FOR DEFAMATION \u201c .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In India, the Model Law has been adopted\nalmost in its entirety in the 1996 Act. &nbsp;This\nAct repealed all the three previous statutes. Its primary purpose was to encourage\narbitration as a cost</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">effective\nand quick mechanism for the settlement of commercial disputes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It covers both domestic arbitration and\ninternational commercial arbitration. It marked an epoch in the struggle to\nfind an alternative to the snail paced&nbsp;\ntraditional way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The changes brought\nabout by the 1996 Act were so drastic that the entire case law built up over the\nprevious fifty</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">six\nyears on arbitration was rendered superfluous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Government of India\nenacted the 1996 Act by an ordinance, and then extended its life by another\nordinance, before Parliament eventually passed it without reference to\nParliamentary Committee. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Government of\nIndia&nbsp; amended the Arbitration and\nConciliation Act, 1996 by introducing the Arbitration and Conciliation\n(Amendment) Bill, 2015 in the Parliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arbitration_and_Conciliation_Act_1996\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arbitration_and_Conciliation_Act_1996</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The legal Indian\nprofession has long ago&nbsp; ceased to be a\nnoble&nbsp; service oriented system<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vested system\nignored their legitimate interests of the people and boggled down to the\ntechniques, rules and&nbsp; unreasonable\nlevels of interpretation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This led to people being alienated from the system\nand they avoided litigation like the plague .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alternative dispute\nresolution consists of methods like negotiation, mediation, arbitration and\nconciliation, any of which may be used to achieve an out-of-court\nsettlement.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While negotiation involves\nthe parties solving their disputes face-to-face without outside intervention,\nmediation and arbitration involve the assistance of a third-party.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mediator facilitates an agreement by\nbouncing non-binding solutions off of parties, while an arbitrator functions\nmore in the nature of a judge and delivers binding but appealable awards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The National and State\nLegal Services Authorities must disseminate more information regarding these, FAST\nTRACK informal courts so they become the first option explored by potential\nlitigants. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While it is the duty of\nthe judiciary to ensure justice for one and all, it is also the duty of\ncitizens to protect it from the burden of unnecessary litigation by resolving\nminor disputes among themselves and approaching the court only as a final\nresort.&nbsp; Our Judicial system must be part\nof the NCERT school books.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 39A of the\nConstitution of India directs the State to secure that the operation of the\nlegal system promotes justice, on a basis of equal opportunity, and shall, in\nparticular provide free legal aid, by suitable legislation or schemes or in any\nother way, to ensure that opportunities for securing justice are not denied to\nany citizen by economic or other disabilities.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">HELL --OUR COLLEGIUM SYSTEM ITSELF IS UNCONSTITUTIONAL.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SUCCESSIVE LAW MINISTERS HAVE IGNORED THIS ..&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY ?</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Constitution\nrequires us to remove impediments to access to justice in a systematic manner. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All agencies of the\nGovernment are now under a fundamental obligation to enhance access to justice.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 40 which\ndirects the State to take steps to organise village panchayats and endow them\nwith such powers and authority as may be necessary to enable them to function\nas units of self-government, has to be appreciated afresh in the light of the\nmandate of the new article 39A.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ksAi_fHClmo/WJxOSASFvrI/AAAAAAABQq8/vkjHxZZsC_ElzLa1S5iAxLkesLVP1-AwQCEw/s1600/imFFGages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Why is our justice is controlled from abroad.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; king is to protect \"Dharma\"<br />\n<br />\nIT DENOTES FOUR WAYS IN WHICH WORK CAN BE TAKEN FROM OTHERS\u2014BY MOTIVATION<br />\n<br />\nMASLOW LIFTED FROM CHANAKYA NEETI<br />\n<br />\nSAAM -knowledge ( negotiations, ask after explaining why, evince interest for help , convince , create sense of belonging , foster brotherhood , raise awareness from correct perspective )<br />\n<br />\nDAAM -money ( offer , pay , reward, catalyse, mollify , incentives )<br />\n<br />\nDAND - punishment ( create fear by display of power, consequences , sanctions, discipline , penalize )<br />\n<br />\nBHED \u2013 discriminate ( describing right from wrong \u2013conscience appeal , catalyse , laying own terms )<br />\n<br />\nCHANAKYA HAS BEEN MADE OUT TO BE A SON OF A BITCH BY SHALLOW THE MINDED WHITE MAN<br />\n<br />\nBHED IS NOT DIVIDE AND RULE-- NOR TORTURE-- NOR BY HOOK-- NOR BY CROOK-- NOR EXPLOITATION OF VULNERABILITY \u2013 NOR A FOUL STING OPERATION \u2013 NOR AMPUTATE<br />\n<br />\nIn Malayalam and Sanskrit BHED means \u201cbetter option \u201c<br />\n<br />\nDAND is as simple as not allowing your child to eat unless he has washed his hand .<br />\n<br />\n<span the two parties usually embraced and parted after a\nWIN-WIN judgement.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div people\u2019s homes , language and culture &nbsp;holds out greater opportunities for settlement,\nwith near and dear watching the proceedings helf by father figures . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A decision taken by a\nvillage panchayat &nbsp;does not leave behind\nthat trial of bitterness which generally follows in the wake of prodecural litigation\nin ordinary courts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: expedite the\nprocess of arbitration. This legislation has developed confidence among foreign\nparties interested to invest in India or to go for joint ventures, foreign\ninvestment, transfer of technology and foreign collaborations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no court fee\nand no rigid procedural requirement (i.e. no need to follow process given by\nCivil Procedure Code or Evidence Act), which makes the process very fast.\nParties can directly interact with the judge, which is not possible in regular\ncourts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loss of their\nfreedom apart, each of these undertials &nbsp;had to carry the stigma of being criminals and\nmurderers and in most cases by the time the grinding wheels of justice oozed\ntheir final verdict, there really wasn't much of a life to return to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of them don't even\ncome to trial for years though theirs are relatively minor infractions of the\nlaw such as pickpocketing; it's not uncommon for extremely poor undertrials to\nseveral times&nbsp; more time in jail than the\nmaximum term they would have got if convicted.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most developed\ncountries, a wrongful conviction can lead to the aggrieved person seeking huge\ncompensations. The reason is despite their proven innocence, those convicted find\nthe odds of relocating themselves in society difficult.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
