The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating feat...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br /><div>\n<span In 1970, seven\nstates still enforced segregated schooling. met with legislators from all seven\nSouthern states, even traveling down to Louisiana to allay people\u2019s fears. font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.nbcnews.com/politics/donald-trump/michael-wolff-says-donald-trump-least-credible-person-who-has-n834921<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS PROPAGANDA WONT WORK<br />\n<br />\nIT WORKED WITH NIXON-- IT WONT WORK WITH TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/richard-m-nixon-greatest-american.html<br />\n<br />\nNixon made no secret of the fact that he disliked Rosthchilds KOSHER media metropolitan media.<br />\n<br />\nOn Aug. 9, 1974, Nixon became the first U.S. president to resign--FOOLED by rothschilds media that he has LOW approval ratings<br />\n<br />\nTrump knows his support base unlike Nixon<br />\n<br />\nNixon developed an alarming skill at speaking over the head of the media directly to the American people, taking it upon himself to voice the hopes and fears of what he termed \u201cthe silent majority.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nNixon had a overwhelming victory, carrying the Electoral College 521 to 17 and picking up over 60 percent of the popular vote--yet he got fooled by Jew Rothschild's media into resigning<br />\n<br />\nFrom the start, the KOSHER media interests which spoke for the SHADOW establishment treated the Nixon presidency as in some metaphysical sense an outlaw regime<br />\n<br />\nThe powerful KOSHER media barons ( agents of INNER Bilderberg club ) felt themselves morally and constitutionally entitled to snatch back the power Nixon had secured from the voters by (as they tom tommed) chicanery. All they needed was a pretext--which they cooked up.<br />\n<br />\nNixon played into their hands. His deep sense of insecurity, reinforced by what was now almost a paranoid fear of the EVIL press, led him to confuse a perfectly justified desire to prevent the media from publishing state secrets\u2014as they had done in the case of the Pentagon Papers and other documents\u2014with the routine skulduggery of party-political espionage.<br />\n<br />\nThe result was the Watergate mess.<br />\n<br />\nIn essence, Watergate was a mess and nothing more.<br />\n<br />\nThe notion that he plotted an assault on the Constitution and the rule of law is a malicious invention of COMMIE JEWS.<br />\n<br />\nNixon's defeat is a frightening example of how the will of a popular majority can be frustrated and overturned by the skillful manipulation of EVIL kosher main stream media<br />\n<br />\nThis was the first media PUTSCH in history, as ruthless and anti-democratic as any military coup by bemedaled generals with their sashes and sabers.<br />\n<br />\nTRUMP USES TWITTER SKILFULLY. HE IS A BUSINESS MAN AND KNOWS HOW AND WHEN TO SHOOT THROUGH HIS HOLSTER--AT THE KOSHER MEDIA BASTARDS WHO TRY THE SAME \"IMPEACHMENT \" CHICANERY ON HIM , THE WAY THEY DID WITH NIXON AND SUCCEEDED<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil says this-- This planet must know that Nixon's patriotism took precedence over his self-interest, and he cut short the national agony by a voluntary abdication.<br />\n<br />\nIn defeat Nixon was dignified and not at all disposed to recriminate.<br />\nVERY FEW PEOPE ON THIS PLANET UNDERSTANDS US SHADOW GOVT POLITICS.<br />\n<br />\nTRUMP SWEARS TO DRAIN THE SWAP--BUT HEY TRUMP, DO YOU KNOW WHERE THE DRAIN HOLE IS ? DO YOU KNOW HOW LARGE THE SWAMP IS AND HOW SMALL THE DRAIN HOLE IS.<br />\n<br />\nTRUMP-- I HAD WARNED YOU, ONLY \"CLEANIING THE AEGIAN STABLES METHOD\" WILL WORK-- A TSUNAMI -- A PURGE OF MIND BOGGLING PROPORTIONS<br />\n<br />\nMost ex-Presidents are anxious to offer their advice to those who succeed them, and find themselves consulted often out of mere courtesy . Nixon\u2019s advice, by contrast, was eagerly solicited .<br />\n<br />\nNixon was the best of them all-- and had class.<br />\n<br />\nRead all 11 parts of the SUNK post ( by Google algorithms ) below<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/donald-trump-for-president-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE POST ABOVE WILL MARK A WATERSHED -- EL FUTURO<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH YOU DONT UNDERSTAND IS MORE DANGEROUS THAN A LIE.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_124TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_123B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7850080593763729823\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_123M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Issued by successor Gerald R. Ford, that document pardoned Nixon for all crimes he \u201ccommitted or may have committed\u201d in the White House.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">DEEP STATE operative J. Edgar Hoover, the aging FBI Director, spent decades amassing blackmail against his bosses and others in official Washington, spied on his boss the attorney general.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Eugenio Martinez , a Watergate burglar was on the CIA payroll. Martinez and the others were convicted in the ensuing Watergate scandal. The others were Frank Sturgis, Virgilio Gonzalez, Bernard Barker and James McCord. Martinez was pardoned by President Ronald Reagan in 1983..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">So highly prized an asset was the sinewy Bay of Pigs veteran that CIA\u2019s top lawyer adamantly rebuffed a request from lawyers on the Watergate Special Prosecution Force by saying: \u201cUnder no circumstances would the Agency give up all records relating to the Agency\u2019s relationship with Martinez.\u201d</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">The Joint Chiefs, the FBI, the CIA: There are few more powerful institutions in Washington; all three DEEP STATE --were systematically spying on the Nixon White House and campaign committee during the president\u2019s first term.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Mark Felt, the No. 2 FBI official whose leaks during Watergate to Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein of the Washington Post earned him the nickname \u201cDeep Throat.\u201d</span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>THESE MELORD LOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO WILL SLAP CONTEMPT OF COURT ON YOU , IF YOU STAND ON ONE LEG IN HIS PRESENCE , CANT EVEN KEEP THE COURT TOILETS CLEAN&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-04Y8Tv35HXI/WJB3pjKlIUI/AAAAAAABQiE/kGQYhqfRHa83Ls96p9FX0JZq2QYvgEwRACLcB/s1600/SuSSSpreme-Courts-4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"356\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-04Y8Tv35HXI/WJB3pjKlIUI/AAAAAAABQiE/kGQYhqfRHa83Ls96p9FX0JZq2QYvgEwRACLcB/s640/SuSSSpreme-Courts-4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every court in India\nmust first demand that parties to resort to ADR of some type, usually\nmediation, before permitting the parties' cases to be tried.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR is faster , costs\nless than litigation, there is confidentiality, and both parties to have\ngreater control over the selection of the individuals who will decide their\ndispute..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Objectives of the ADR\nProcesses--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022Reduce the burden on courts\nby reducing cases&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022resolve or limit the\nissues in dispute;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022be accessible;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022use resources\nefficiently;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022resolve disputes as\nearly as possible;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022produce outcomes that\nare lawful, effective and acceptable to the parties and the Tribunal;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022enhance the\nsatisfaction of the parties&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR has several\nadvantages over litigation:--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suitable for\nmulti-party disputes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lower costs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likelihood and speed of\nsettlements<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flexibility of process<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Informal</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parties' direct control of\nprocess<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parties' choice of\nforum<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practical solutions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wider range of issues\ncan be considered<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shared future interests\nmay be protected<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confidentiality</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Risk management<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Free from procedural technicalities , cramping the style of cunning lawyers</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">People have a chance\nto tell their story as they see it, without an advocate who twists everything</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Relationship between two parties (separated by ego) restored .</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Less burden in courts struggling with backlog</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a commitment to the result WIN-WIN&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some disputes do not have a legal solution,\nwhile others may be made worse by court action.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Parliament\nenacted the Arbitration and Conciliation Act of 1996 with a view to making\narbitration less technical and more useful and effective<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR techniques are\nextra</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">judicial in character.&nbsp; ADR can be used to settle civil, commercial,\nindustrial and family disputes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR can\nbe used over the full range of business disputes: banking, contract, contract\nperformance and interpretation, construction contracts, intellectual property\nrights, joint ventures, insurance liability, partnership differences, personal\ninjury, product liability, real estate and securities.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR is not intended to\nsupplant altogether the traditional means of resolving disputes by means of\nlitigation. It offers only alternative options to litigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are still a large\nnumber of important areas, including constitutional law and criminal law, in\nrespect of which there is no substitute for court decisions.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR may not be\nappropriate for every dispute even in other areas; even if appropriate, it\ncannot be invoked unless both parties to a dispute are genuinely interested in\na settlement.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alternative Dispute\nResolution\u201d (ADR) encourages the disputants&nbsp;\nto arrive at a negotiated understanding with a minimum of outside help. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the years, largely\ndue to the development of trade and &nbsp;commerce,\narbitration came to be recognized as an effective alternative to formal\njudicial system.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to its own merit of being&nbsp;&nbsp; adjudicatory in nature resulting in binding\ndecision it held the field of a widely practiced alternative to court system.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR &nbsp;techniques have been shown to work across the\nfull range of business disputes:&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 banking,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 contract,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 contract performance\nand<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 interpretation,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 construction\ncontracts,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 intellectual property\nrights,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 joint ventures,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 insurance\nliability,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 partnership\ndifferences,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 personal injury,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 product\nliability,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">\u2022 Real estate and\nsecurities</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The various ADR\ntechniques now well recognized are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arbitration: A binding\nprocedure where the dispute is submitted for adjudication by an arbitral\ntribunal consisting of a sole or an odd number of arbitrators, which gives its\ndecision in the form of an award that finally settles the dispute and is\nbinding on the parties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fast</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">track Arbitration: A\nbinding procedure where parties agree to accelerated arbitral proceedings\nresulting in rendering the arbitral award in a short time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negotiation: A non</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">binding procedure\ninvolving direct interaction of the disputing parties wherein a party approaches\nthe other with the offer of a negotiated settlement based on an objective\nassessment of each other\u2019s position. A trade</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">off\nof other interests not involved in the dispute is not uncommon in a negotiated settlement.\nObjectivity and willingness to arrive at a negotiated settlement on the part of\nboth the parties are essential characteristics of negotiation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mediation: Mediation\nusually involves people meeting face to face in the presence of a neutral third\nperson.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This person listens to\neach party, helps them identify their real interests and needs and then the parties\nnegotiate a settlement which will meet those needs.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The mediator does not\ntake sides, give legal advice or impose a solution. Mediators assist people by managing\nthe negotiation process, helping people listen to each other and keeping them\non track.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mediation is used to\nsuccessfully resolve many community, family, tenancy, commercial, building, workplace,\nindustrial relations and environmental disputes. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conciliation: In\nmediation, the mediator tries to guide the discussion in a way that optimizes\nparties\u2019 needs, takes feelings into account and reframes representations.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Conciliation differs\nfrom arbitration in that the conciliation process, in and of itself, has no\nlegal standing, and the conciliator usually has no authority to seek evidence\nor call witnesses, usually writes no decision, and makes no award. Conciliation\ndiffers from mediation in that the main goal is to conciliate, most of the time\nby seeking concessions.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mediation Arbitration\n(MED</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARB) : A procedure\nwhere the parties agree to settle their dispute first by attempting a\nconciliation within a specified time, failing which by arbitration. This is\ndistinct from conciliation in the course of arbitral proceedings where, if a\nsettlement is reached, the arbitration proceedings are terminated by making an\naward on agreed terms.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mini</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">trial: A non</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">binding procedure where\nthe disputing parties present their respective cases before their senior\nexecutives who are competent to take decisions and who are assisted by a\nneutral third party. Thus, the executives have an objective assessment of the\ndispute and, if possible; they can mutually arrive at an amicable\nsettlement.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expert Determination,\nthe parties appoint an expert to consider their issues and to make a binding\ndecision or appraisal without necessarily having to conduct an enquiry\nfollowing adjudicatory rules.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Private judging, the\nCourt refers the case to a referee chosen by the parties to decide some or all\nof the issues, or to establish any specific facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judge hosted settlement\nconference: In this court</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">based\nADR process, the settlement judge (or magistrate) presides over a meeting of\nthe parties in an effort to help them reach a settlement. Judges have played a variety\nof roles in these conferences, articulating opinions about the merits of the\ncase, facilitating the trading of settlement offers, and sometimes acting as\nthe mediator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Court</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">annexed arbitration,\nrequires statutory introduction into the Court system, and which, depending upon\nthe model adopted, may be binding or initially non</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">binding, and may or may\nnot provide for a re</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010 </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hearing\nby a judge under certain circumstances. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Code of Civil\nProcedure (Amendment) Act, 1999 provides for Court</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">annexed ADR processes.\nRegulatory Negotiation or Reg</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2010</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neg:\nUsed by governmental agencies as an alternative to the more traditional\napproach of issuing regulations after a lengthy notice and comment period.\nInstead, \u201cagency officials and affected private parties meet under the guidance\nof a neutral facilitator to engage in joint negotiation and the drafting of the\nrule. The public is then asked to comment on the resulting, proposed rule. By\nencouraging participation of interested stakeholders, the process makes use of\nprivate parties\u2019 perspectives and expertise, and can help avoid subsequent\nlitigation over the resulting rule.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ombudsperson: An\ninformal dispute resolution tool used by organizations. A third party\nombudsperson is appointed by the organization to investigate complaints within\nthe institution and prevent disputes or facilitate their resolution. The\nOmbudsperson may use various ADR mechanisms in the process of resolving disputes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1996, The\nArbitration and Conciliation Act was passed in India, which was based on the\nUNCITRAL model.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.uncitral.org/pdf/english/texts/arbitration/ml-arb/07-86998_Ebook.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.uncitral.org/pdf/english/texts/arbitration/ml-arb/07-86998_Ebook.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amendments to this Act\nwere made taking into account the various opinions of the leading corporate and\nbusinessmen who utilize this Act the most. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sufficient provisions have been created and\namended in the area of Lok Adalats in order to help the rural and commoner\nsegments to make most use of this unique Alternative Dispute Resolution\nmechanism in India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, today the\nprovisions in India sufficiently provide for Alternative Dispute Resolution.\nHowever, its implementation has been restricted to just large corporate or big\nbusiness firms. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lok Adalats, though an\nancient concept in Indian Society, has not been implemented to its utmost\nlevel. &nbsp;People still opt for internecine litigation\nin many spheres due to a lot of drawbacks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These methods of ADR deliver\na well-rounded and satisfying experience WIN-WIN for the parties involved. &nbsp;It provides them the opportunity to\n\"expand the pie\" through creative, collaborative bargaining, and\nfulfil the interests driving their demands . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus, ADR can help the\nparties save time, energy and money that would otherwise have been needlessly\nexpended on endless litigation. The lawyer makes all the money over decades and\nit is LOSE \u2013LOSE</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India cannot become a\nsuperpower in 16 years if our Judicial system remains this way\u2026&nbsp; The PM can be abused and called MAUT KA SAUDAGAR\n, but if you stand on one leg in front of the judge he will FUCK you.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_199M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KARUNANIDHI EVEN HAD HIS PET DALIT JUDGE ASHOK KUMAR , WHO CRIED WHEN KARUNANIDHI WAS ARRESTED, ASKING \"IS YOUR HEART MADE OF MUSCLE OR MUD!!\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In USA contempt of court , long ago fell foul of the 1st Amendment and is dismissed as English foolishness - it was contempt against a JEW ROTHSCHILD APPOINTED JUDGE actually .</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In UK there is NO contempt of court since the 1930s-- and was formally abolished a year ago .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADR settles disputes\nthrough arbitration, conciliation, mediation and negotiation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The technique of ADR is\nan effort to design a workable and fair alternative to our traditional judicial\nsystem. &nbsp;Any smart lawyer can drown you\nin the quicksand of procedures of a blind justice system.&nbsp; ADR is a fast track system of dispensing\njustice. &nbsp;Like I said, there are various\nADR techniques viz. arbitration, mediation, conciliation,\nmediation-arbitration, mini-trial, private judging, final offer arbitration,\ncourt-annexed ADR and summary jury trial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADT provides a &nbsp;congenial atmosphere and a less formal and\nless complicated forum for various types of disputes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS THING OF LAWYERS\nPUTTING ON HOOKS ON POOR PEOPLE BY TAAREEQ PEH TAAREEQ PEH TAAREEQ --AND MAKING\nTHEM PAUPERS OVER ONE OR TWO DECADES MUST STOP .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR ALLEGEDLY SHOOTING\nA BLACK BUCK , HOW LONG HAS SALMAN KHANs CASE DRAGGED ON? &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOW MUCH DID HIS LAWYER\nMAKE &nbsp;DURING THIS PERIOD ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BATAO NAH --PLEAJJE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PIG IS USEFUL ONLY WHEN\nDEAD ( NOT WHEN ALIVE ) \u2026 WHAT ABOUT THIS VENERABLE BLACK BUCK ?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HULLO LAW MINISTER\u2014ARE YOU\nAWAKE ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>HULLLLOOOOOOO !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The advantage of ADR is\nthat it avoids seeking recourse to the SLOW/ EXPENSIVE /UNFAIR courts\u2014who do\nnot have any idea of local culture.. &nbsp;&nbsp;In\nconciliation/mediation, parties are free to withdraw at any stage of time. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been proved that resolution of\ndisputes is quicker through ADR. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nparties involved in ADR do not develop strained relations; rather they maintain\nthe continued relationship between themselves.. Parties may even submit\nsuggestions for the settlement of the dispute to the conciliator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it appears to the\nconciliator that elements of settlement exist, he may draw up the terms of\nsettlement and send it to the parties for their acceptance. If both the parties\nsign the settlement document, it shall be final and binding on both.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note that in USA, this\nprocess is similar to Mediation. However, in India, Mediation is different from\nConciliation and is a completely informal type of ADR mechanism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt.
