margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"396\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9N3plWcnCdY/WIgkFJRhrvI/AAAAAAABQZ0/EM3kEKuZXwQqddL8Tow9-eNRp16bFEuKwCLcB/s640/86-01-016SS-Wreck-Web.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: Magellan tried too hard to convert Filipinos from Hinduism and Christianity-- and got killed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PKRIl4zrLSk/WIglTrCn7zI/AAAAAAABQaA/7TGclrLc4DYb0VnAs-1ItI5h3SJzDNCgwCLcB/s1600/laxl295054.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PKRIl4zrLSk/WIglTrCn7zI/AAAAAAABQaA/7TGclrLc4DYb0VnAs-1ItI5h3SJzDNCgwCLcB/s640/laxl295054.jpg\" width=\"578\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-033-IhFvtQE/WIgksOB05pI/AAAAAAABQZ8/AWWdTFjA8QIg5Jl1zsSRoJl5_PF2IN_yACLcB/s1600/800px-MaSSgellan%2527s_voyage_EN.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"354\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-033-IhFvtQE/WIgksOB05pI/AAAAAAABQZ8/AWWdTFjA8QIg5Jl1zsSRoJl5_PF2IN_yACLcB/s640/800px-MaSSgellan%2527s_voyage_EN.svg.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a Hindu king named\nLapu-Lapu refused to convert, Magellan\u2019s men burned his village on the island\nof Mactan. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Magellan later returned to\nMactan with 49 men and demanded that Lapu-Lapu yield to his authority. &nbsp;&nbsp;The king refused, and in the ensuing battle\nMagellan was killed after he was repeatedly stabbed by the islanders\u2019 cutlasses\nand scimitars. &nbsp;In the Philippines, where\nMagellan is remembered as a tyrant rather than a hero, the Battle of Mactan is\nreenacted every April 27. &nbsp;Today Hinduism\nis dead in Phillipines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nBelow: Whenever Hindu relics were found in Phillipines, Christian zealots destroyed it . <br />\n<br />\nBelow picture is of 1200 year old Laguna copper plate &nbsp;.<br />\n<br />\nMost Hindu relics were in gold and thieves melted it down<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Xy0PL3Z0-f8/WIgpsDMCiLI/AAAAAAABQaM/ynFW5L97Co8rANQZNYBbcaU_Lz67D6IRwCLcB/s1600/LagunaCopperplateLerrucbanHHCS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"340\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Xy0PL3Z0-f8/WIgpsDMCiLI/AAAAAAABQaM/ynFW5L97Co8rANQZNYBbcaU_Lz67D6IRwCLcB/s640/LagunaCopperplateLerrucbanHHCS.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A gold artifact, from\nthe Tabon Caves in the island of Palawan, is an image of <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Garuda</span>, the bird who\nis the mount of <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Vishnu.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The golden Agusan\nstatue is <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Shiva\u2019s wife Shakti.</span> &nbsp; It is 1.79\nkilogram, 22 carat gold Hindu goddess Agusan ( Parvati), found in Mindanao in\n1917 after a storm and flood exposed its location. &nbsp;This 2000 year old statue is now at the Field\nMuseum of Natural History in Chicago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Golden humped bull\nis <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Shiva\u2019s Nandi vahana</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Laguna plate\ninscriptions :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Swasti. &nbsp;\u1e62akha</span> war\u1e63atita 822 Vaishakha masa di(ng)\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Jyoti\u1e63ha.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chaturthi Kri\u1e63napaksa\nSomaw\u0101ra sana tatkala Dayang Angkatan lawan dengan nya s\u0101nak barngaran si Bukah\nanak da dang Hwan Namwaran di bari warad\u0101na wi shuddhapattra ulih sang pamegat\nsen\u0101pati di Tundun barja(di) dang Hwan N\u0101yaka tuhan Pailah Jayadewa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long Live! In the Year\nof<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> Saka </span>822, month of <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Vaishakha</span>, according to the astronomer.&nbsp; The fourth day of the waning moon, Monday. &nbsp;&nbsp;On this\noccasion, Lady Angkatan, and her relative whose name is Bukah, the children of\nthe Honourable Namwaran, were awarded a document of complete pardon from the\nCommander-in-Chief of Tundun, represented by the Lord Minister of Pailah,\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Jayadeva</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Di krama dang Hwan\nNamwaran dengan dang kayastha shuddha nu di parlappas hutang da walenda Kati 1\nSuwarna 8 di hadapan dang Huwan Nayaka tuhan Puliran Kasumuran dang Hwan Nayaka\ntuhan Pailah barjadi ganashakti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means that,\nthrough the Honourable Scribe, the Honourable Namwaran is totally cleared of\nhis salary-related debts of 1 Kat\u00ee and 8<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> Suvarna</span>, before the Honorable Lord\nMinister of Puliran Kasumuran; by the authority of the Lord Minister of Pailah,\nrepresented by <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ganashakti.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dang Hwan Nayaka tuhan\nBinwangan barjadi bishruta tathapi sadana sanak kapawaris ulih sang pamegat\nDewata [ba]rjadi sang pamegat Medang dari bhaktinda diparhulun sang pamegat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the Honourable and\nwidely-renowned Lord Minister of Binwagan, represented by <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Visruta</span>. And, with\nhis whole family, upon ordered of the Lord Minister of <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Devata</span>, represented by\nthe Chief of Medang, because of his loyalty as a subject of the\nCommander-in-Chief.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fables and stories in\nFilipino Culture are still linked to Panchtantra.&nbsp;&nbsp; Major epics and folk literature of\nPhilippines show common themes, plots, climax and ideas expressed in the Mahabharata\nand the Ramayana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1595, the newly\nappointed Archbishop of Manila became the Inquisitor-General of &nbsp;Philippines\u2014 Filipino Hindus were tortured and\nkilled\u2014a genocide which the western historians have ignored.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Today Wikipedia accepts the Goan Inquisition ,\nthanks to this blogsite<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Filipino dialects are\nloaded with Sanskrit and &nbsp;Malayalam ( my\nlanguage ) words. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just a few below \u2013there\nare hundreds of them. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My crew were mostly\nFilipino\u2014I know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TAGALOG:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statue depicting Shiva\nas Nataraja.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">budh\u00ee\n\"conscience\" from the Sanskrit bodhi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bathala \"bhattara\n- Hindu God Shiva\" from the Sanskrit Bhattara<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dulita \"one who\nsuffers\" from the Sanskrit durita<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dukh\u00e2\n\"poverty\" from the Sanskrit dukkha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">gur\u00f3\n\"teacher\" from the Sanskrit guru<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sampalataya\n\"faith\" from the Sanskrit sampratyaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mukh\u00e2 \"face\"\nfrom the Sanskrit mukha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">lah\u00f2\n\"eclipse\", \"disappear\" from the Sanskrit rahu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">maharlika\n\"noble\" from Sanskrit mahardikka<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">saranggola\n\"kite\" from Sanskrit layang gula <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">asawa\n\"spouse\" from Sanskrit swami<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bagay \"thing\"\nfrom \"vagai\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tal\u00e0 \"star\"\nfrom Sanskrit tara<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">puto, a traditional\nrice pastry, from &nbsp;puttu ( Kerala\nbreakfast dish Puttu )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KAPAMPANGAN:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kalma \"fate\"\nfrom the Sanskrit karma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">damla \"divine\nlaw\" from the Sanskrit dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mantala -\"magic\nformulas\" from the Sanskrit mantra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">upaya \"power\"\nfrom the Sanskrit upaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">lupa \"face\"\nfrom the Sanskrit rupa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sabla \"every\"\nfrom the Sanskrit sarva<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">lawu\n\"eclipse\" from the Sanskrit rahu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Galura \"giant\neagle (a surname)\" from the Sanskrit garuda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Laksina\n\"south\" (a surname) from the Sanskrit dakshin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Laksamana/Lacsamana/Laxamana\n\"admiral\" (a surname) from the Sanskrit lakshmana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CEBUANO:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">budaya\n\"culture\" from Sanskrit; combination of buddhi, \"intellect\"\nand dhaya, \"power\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">balita \"news\"\nfrom Sanskrit varta<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">baya \"warning to\nsomeone in danger\" from Sanskrit bhaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dewata\n\"goddess\" from Sanskrit devata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">gadya\n\"elephant\" from Sanskrit gajha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">puasa\n\"fasting\" from Sanskrit upavasa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">saks\u00ed\n\"witness\" from Sanskrit sakshi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TAUSUG:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">suarga\n\"heaven\"; compare swarga in Sanskrit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">agama\n\"religion\" \u2013tradition in Sanskrit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sutl\u00e1 \"silk\" from\nthe Sanskrit sutli<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">naga \"dragon\"\nor \"serpent\" from the Sanskrit n\u0101ga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">karahay a cooking pan,\nfrom the Sanskrit karahi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tura the word meaning\n\"to write\" came from the Sanskrit sutra</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kapo the word cotton\nfrom Sanskrit kerpas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Modern Filipinos consider\nSpaniard Miguel L\u00f3pez de Legazpi a hero.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Below: San Agustin church Manila</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j-TfI6ktrgk/WIg6s_Q0XpI/AAAAAAABQaw/vTX1cSacZT0Bu9Kv38dE1DGof5mlSY4SwCLcB/s1600/san-agssustin-church.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j-TfI6ktrgk/WIg6s_Q0XpI/AAAAAAABQaw/vTX1cSacZT0Bu9Kv38dE1DGof5mlSY4SwCLcB/s640/san-agssustin-church.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-81y1BKHOOZM/WIg7VFNV3UI/AAAAAAABQa4/0jPaYnuWjLcfIJfrhjkNfqcBoc2y1SWqACLcB/s1600/galleontours-sslegazpi-manila-300x169.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-81y1BKHOOZM/WIg7VFNV3UI/AAAAAAABQa4/0jPaYnuWjLcfIJfrhjkNfqcBoc2y1SWqACLcB/s640/galleontours-sslegazpi-manila-300x169.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This man was a most\nevil inquisitor who spread small pox in this island nation ( 1565 AD ) to\nsubdue natives and convert them to Christianity. &nbsp; &nbsp;My revelations now jump to</span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"> 27.0 %</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/fransisco-pizarro-hernan-cortez.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/fransisco-pizarro-hernan-cortez.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/christopher-columbus-father-of-american.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/christopher-columbus-father-of-american.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">L\u00f3pez de Legazpi's\nexpedition anchored off the Hindu Rajahnate of Cebu on February 13, 1565, but could\nnot land due to fierce opposition from Hindu Filipino natives. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Magellan expedition, King Philip II\nof Spain sent Miguel L\u00f3pez de Legazpi in 1543 and 1565 and claimed the islands\nfor Spain. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu Vishayans were given the\nchoice convert or die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The powerful Hindu king\nRajah Tupas was the last Rajah of Cebu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu King Rajah\nHumabon, was the Rajah of Cebu at the time of Portuguese explorer Ferdinand\nMagellan's arrival in the Philippines in 1521. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cebu was\nthe most advanced and richest province in the Philippines. The Vishayan people\nwere all Hindu and even today they are the largest ethnic group in the country,\nnumbering at around 38 million.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 16th century marked the beginning of the\nChristianization of the Visayan people, with the baptism of Rajah Humabon and more\nthan 900 native Cebuanos. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesuit historian Pedro\nChirino has written foul lies about the ancient Hindu Vishayans. These people believed\nin Karma and Moksha and their deities were devatas..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">L\u00f3pez de Legazpi worked\nfervently using extreme violence to convert the Hindu Filipino natives to the\nChristian religion&nbsp; .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZwofPTd5IRI/WIg6NC-N4AI/AAAAAAABQas/qYeIoQgCDM4AY4hBKhXfPl3-TkY39P91wCLcB/s1600/236px-Legazddpi500peso.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZwofPTd5IRI/WIg6NC-N4AI/AAAAAAABQas/qYeIoQgCDM4AY4hBKhXfPl3-TkY39P91wCLcB/s400/236px-Legazddpi500peso.jpg\" width=\"393\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: Converted Hindu\nKing Datu Sikatuna of the island of Bohol in the Philippines making peace with\nSpanish Inquisitor Miguel L\u00f3pez de Legazpi on March 16, 1565 near the modern\ntown of Loay.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Both cut their hands\ncollected blood in two wine cups and drank the mixture. &nbsp;This is known as \"Sandugo\"&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v5NrXJBxcS0/WIg8RsMHRvI/AAAAAAABQbE/MJviOr-_sUct0xK_wIyKlvUjlJh_GFxdACLcB/s1600/xx11.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v5NrXJBxcS0/WIg8RsMHRvI/AAAAAAABQbE/MJviOr-_sUct0xK_wIyKlvUjlJh_GFxdACLcB/s640/xx11.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In 1609, Antonio de\nMorga, Alcalde of Criminal Causes, in the Royal Audiencia of New Spain wrote:</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201c After the islands had\nbeen conquered by the sovereign light of the holy gospel which entered therein,\nthe heathen were baptized, the darkness of their paganism ( Hinduism ) was\nbanished and they changed their own for Christian names. The islands also,\nlosing their former name, took \u2014 with the change of religion and the baptism of\ntheir inhabitants \u2014 that of Filipinas Islands, in recognition of the great\nfavors received at the hands of his Majesty Filipe the Second, our sovereign,\nin whose fortunate time and reign they were conquered, protected and\nencouraged, as a work and achievement of his royal hands.\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spanish Inquisitor Miguel\nL\u00f3pez de Legazpi arrived in modern Manila in 1571 and subdued the local Hindu\npopulation. The Hindu king was tortured and killed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1570 he sent an\nexpedition to the northern island of Luzon, arriving there himself the next\nyear. After deposing a local Muslim ruler, in 1571 he established the city of\nManila, which became the capital of the new Spanish colony and Spain\u2019s major\ntrading port in East Asia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern Filipinos do NOT\nknow that their nation is named after King Phillip II of Spain. They do NOT\nknow that their beer San Miguel is Spanish. &nbsp;I have been to the beer factory in Huelva\nSpain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cassava, maize, and\nsweet potatoes in Phillipines are from India, planted by Rothschild in 1764\n.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Filipinos\nworshipped Brihaspati . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva is called\nBathala Guru in Phillipines and Java-- placed on Nandi the humped bull.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o1YLRopUUJ8/WIhXbkiz7VI/AAAAAAABQbY/rqrPwE7bD1kSdRHqmvs1ItmnxmJ_R4RfwCLcB/s1600/indianw-influences.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o1YLRopUUJ8/WIhXbkiz7VI/AAAAAAABQbY/rqrPwE7bD1kSdRHqmvs1ItmnxmJ_R4RfwCLcB/s400/indianw-influences.jpg\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The rest of the planet in\nancient times who were NOT followers of Brihaspati were followers of bitter\nrival Shukracharya ( the political adviser to King Mahabali of Kerala )</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YlxiKw4tN8s/0.jpg\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YlxiKw4tN8s?feature=player_embedded\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FILIPINOS CAN BECOME A\nWORLD POWER IF THEY KICK OUT CHRISTIANITY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ako ay Pilipino&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I\nam a Filipino<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Ang dugo'y Maharlika&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Of\nMaharlikan blood</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likas sa aking puso&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Innate\nto my heart<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adhikaing kay ganda&nbsp; &nbsp; Is a\ngoal so fair<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sa Pilipinas na aking\nbayan&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For the Philippines my\nmotherland<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lantay na Perlas ng\nSilanganan&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pearl of the Orient so pristine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wari'y natipon ang\nkayamanan ng Maykapal.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Seems\nall the riches of our Creator has abound.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bigay sa 'king talino&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A gift to me of wisdom<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sa mabuti lang laan&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Is only served for good<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sa aki'y katutubo&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Within me it's natural<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ang maging mapagmahal.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To be everloving.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ako ay Pilipino,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I am a Filipino,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ako ay Pilipino&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I am a Filipino<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isang bansa, isang diwa&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One\nnation, one spirit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ang minimithi ko&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Is what I dream of<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sa bayan ko't bandila&nbsp; To my flag and my country<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Laan buhay ko't diwa Offer my life and spirit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilipinong totoo.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A Filipino for real.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "208", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4825748310251872471/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "1730169065681564130", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-01-22T19:19:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-01-27T18:20:01+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg1NTIxNDAxODIzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_22.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1730169065681564130", "title": "Justice cannot be blind , NATURAL JUSTICE shall be inherent , CONTEXT shall be the perimeter, part NINE \u2013 Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Most criminals are very\ncareful not to generate any direct evidence while they are committing a crime.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Because of this, courts often depend on\ncircumstantial evidence to determine the facts of the case.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis a fact that can be used to infer another fact.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Most successful\nprosecutions rely greatly on circumstantial evidence. &nbsp; &nbsp;Circumstantial evidence\noften has an advantage over direct evidence because it is more difficult to\nsuppress or fabricate.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis more persuasive than direct evidence.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO\nFAKE SEVERAL STRANDS OF CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE&nbsp;\nUNLESS YOU ARE A GENIUS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indirect evidence that\nimplies something occurred but doesn't directly prove it; proof of one or more\nfacts from which one can find another fact; proof of a chain of facts and\ncircumstances indicating that the person is either guilty or not guilty.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis based on reasoning and inference-drawing through probability.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\njudge must apply his brains ( mostly non- existent ) , logic, common sense\nperception, and experience to the evidence.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;They must consider the inherent probabilities\nand improbabilities, frequently eliminating the possibility of coincidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>FIBRE / YARN / STRANDS MAKE A STOUT ROPE STRONG ENOUGH TO HANG A CRIMINAL&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gOIBTnfnuGk/WITHjAdUzQI/AAAAAAABQZE/J7rmfNSpEqUMFTqQn8ARVNbCWuyWw9I1ACLcB/s1600/6a00e0099229e88833013SS48509ffdb970c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gOIBTnfnuGk/WITHjAdUzQI/AAAAAAABQZE/J7rmfNSpEqUMFTqQn8ARVNbCWuyWw9I1ACLcB/s640/6a00e0099229e88833013SS48509ffdb970c.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a case of a theft,\nexamples of circumstantial evidence include:-----</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evidence of the\ndefendant's fingerprints at the scene of the crime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that the\ndefendant was found with a large amount of money without being able to give any\nreason.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of a\nmurder, examples of circumstantial evidence include:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that the\naccused had an intense dislike of the victim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that the\naccused behaved in a bizarre and suspicious way after the offence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that he or she\nlied about his or her alibi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that he or she\nwas in the area at the time that the offence was committed</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that the\ndefendant's blood or DNA corresponds to blood or DNA found on the victim's\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">A judge must be\nsatisfied beyond a reasonable doubt that the only rational inference that can\nbe drawn from the circumstantial evidence is one of guilt.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Evidence that the\naccused and victim had a good relationship is not evidence of a lack of motive,\nbut a lack of evidence of a motive<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis based largely on inference and uses inductive reasoning. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Inductive inference is based\non observations-and deductive inference is based on theory.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term\n\"inductive reasoning\" requires a CONSCIOUS BRAIN refers to reasoning\nthat takes specific information and makes a broader generalization that is\nconsidered probable, allowing for the fact that the conclusion may not be\naccurate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inductive reasoning is\nbottom-up reasoning</span>; it starts with a probable conclusion and induces premises.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Deductive reasoning is\nalso known as 'top-down reasoning'</span> because it goes from general and works its\nway down more specific</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is\nreasoning where the premises support the conclusion. The conclusion is the\nhypothesis, or probable.&nbsp;&nbsp; This means\nthat the conclusion is the part of reasoning that inductive reasoning is trying\nto prove&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is\nalso referred to as 'cause and effect reasoning' or 'bottom-up reasoning'\nbecause it seeks to prove a conclusion first. This is usually derived from\nspecific instances to develop a general conclusion.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is\na logical process in which multiple premises, all believed true or found true\nmost of the time, are combined to obtain a specific conclusion &nbsp;. Inductive\nreasoning is used in applications that involve prediction, forecasting,\nor behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is\nthe opposite of deductive reasoning. Inductive reasoning makes broad\ngeneralizations from specific observations. &nbsp;&nbsp;In inductive inference, we go from the\nspecific to the general. &nbsp;We make many\nobservations, discern a pattern, make a generalization, and infer an\nexplanation or a theory<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning has\nits place in the scientific method. &nbsp;&nbsp;Scientists\nuse it to form hypotheses and theories. &nbsp;&nbsp;Deductive reasoning allows them to apply the\ntheories to specific situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is, unlike deductive\nreasoning, not logically rigorous.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning is\nsometimes confused with mathematical induction, an entirely different process.&nbsp; &nbsp;Mathematical induction is a form of deductive\nreasoning, in which logical certainties are \"daisy chained\" to derive\na general conclusion about an infinite number of objects or situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In inductive reasoning,\nwe begin with specific observations and measures, begin to detect patterns and\nregularities, formulate some tentative hypotheses that we can explore, and\nfinally end up developing some general conclusions or theories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive reasoning, by its very nature, is\nmore open-ended and exploratory, especially at the beginning. &nbsp;Deductive reasoning is more narrow in nature\nand is concerned with testing or confirming hypotheses.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inductive and deductive\nreasoning are both forms of propositional logic. Propositional logic is the\nbranch of logic that studies ways of joining and/or modifying entire\npropositions, statements or sentences to form more complicated propositions,\nstatements or sentences.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deductive reasoning is\nreasoning where true premises develop a true and valid conclusion.&nbsp; In the case of deductive reasoning, the\nconclusion must be true if the premises are also true. Deductive reasoning uses\ngeneral principles to create a specific conclusion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be convincing (and\nadmissible in court), circumstantial evidence must:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be relevant, of course,\nthat is, tend to prove or disprove a fact in issue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be cumulative, that is,\nnot limited to one, isolated piece of evidence, but of several inter-connected\nparts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be tightly organized\nand clearly presented: many circumstantial cases fail not because the evidence\nis weak, but because it is presented in a disorganized and confusing manner\nwhich the fact finder cannot understand;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And finally, to be\npersuasive (and admissible in court) circumstantial evidence must exclude all\nplausible innocent explanations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A case based on\ncircumstantial evidence may be just as convincing and reliable as a case based\nupon direct evidence.. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>It is important\nthat you approach a circumstantial case by considering and weighing, as a\nwhole, all the facts you find established by the evidence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is wrong to\nconsider any particular fact in isolation and ask whether that fact proves the\nguilt of the accused, or whether there is any explanation for that particular\nfact or circumstance which is inconsistent with guilt<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>of the accused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CAPTAIN , WHY DO YOU\nUSE THIS TERM \" </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>THROW SOME BREAD CRUMBS IN HIS GENERAL DIRECTION</b></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"> \"<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN I SIGNED OFF SHIPS\nAT THE END OF MY CONTRACT , THE OWNERS OF THE SHIP USUALLY WOULD WANT TO MEET\nME TO \"DEBRIEF ME \"<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; WHERE\nJUDGES ARE NOT BRAINY ENOUGH TO GLEAN CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
