text-decoration: none;\">January 19, 2017 at 11:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi s,<br />\n<br />\nONCE I WENT TO THE ESPLANADE COURT IN MUMBAI-<br />\n<br />\nIT IS WALKING DISTANCE FROM VT TRAIN TERMINUS<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOILET WITHIN THE COURT CAMPUS ( NEXT TO PHOTOSTAT / TEA SHOP )COULD BE SMELT A MILE AWAY<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN 10 METRES YOUR EYES WATER DUE TO STING OF URINE AMMONIA<br />\n<br />\nI STILL WENT TO THE TOILET FOR A PEE - THERE WAS NO BULB<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOILET HAS NOT BEEN CLEANED FOR MORE THAN TWO YEARS<br />\n<br />\nWHILE I WAS PEEING A POLICE INSPECTOR ( SENIOR ) CAME TO PEE ALONGSIDE ME-- &nbsp;HE KEPT DOING AAARGGGHH &nbsp;PPTTHHEEOOOYY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS SHIP CAPTAIN THE CREW KNEW THAT CAPTAIN VISITS CREW TOILETS EVERY WEEK -UN ANNOUNCED<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS TOILET WAS INSIDE A CREW CABIN I USED THE MASTER KEY -UN ANNOUNCED -- NEVER WOKE UP A SLEEPING WATCHKEEPER ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS PART OF THE LIVING LEGEND LORE OF CAPT VADAKAYIL AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nTAREEQ PEH PAAREEQ PEH TAREEQ FEEDS USELESS LAWYERS FOR A LIFETIME. &nbsp; &nbsp;AT CURRENT RATES EVEN A <span style=\"color: red;\">SMALL DELEGATED SUB-JUNIOR LAWYERS CHARGES 5000 RUPEES.</span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE ALTERNATIVE ?<br />\n<br />\nFOR YOU TO GO CROSS COUNTRY STAY IN A HOTEL FOR 2 DAYS AND TAKE THE TAREEQ YOURSELF?<br />\n<br />\nWHILE THE LAWYER WILL GET IT ON HIS MOBILE PHONE BY GIVING A BAKSHEESH TO THE COURT CLERK --WHO IS MORE CORRUPT THAN ALL.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WENT TO THE ESPLANADE MUMBAI COURT-- THERE WAS A FRIENDLY DOG ( NO FLEAS ) INSIDE THE COURTROOM HAPPILY SITTING THERE WATCHING THE JUDGE<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT HEAR ANYTHING WHAT THE JUDGE SAYS ..MAYBE IT IS DELIBERATE.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS PIGEON SHIT ALL OVER<br />\n<br />\nI HAD TEA AT THE COURT CAMPUS --AND NEXT TWO DAYS I HAD LOOSE MOTION. &nbsp; THE STOMACH RUMBLE GURGLE STARTED WITHIN 5 MINUTES OF HAVING THE TEA ( TEA WAS TASTY )<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DONT PUT UP THE NEXT TAREEEQ DATE ON THE NOTICE BOARD-- FOR OBVIOUS REASONS.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TAREEQ DATE MUST BE PUT ON THE INTERNET/ MOBILE PHONE APP --WHERE YOU CAN USE A CODE NUMBER TO ACCESS ( HULLO LAW MINISTER --- DO YOUR FUCKIN' JOB --ENOUGH OF SUCKING UP TO MODI )</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE TAREEQ DATE MILKING CONTINUES FOR 20 TO 30 YEARS .<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES SUPREME COURT TAKE UP IPL CRICKET DATES EVEN ON SUNDAYS ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS NORMAL PROCEDURE SKIPPED FOR IPL ?<br />\n<br />\nI AM SURE THE COLLEGIUM JUDGES KNOWS ROTHSCHILDs INDIAN FRONTS IN BCCI AND IPL.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BEST PART IS ALL TRAITOR SIR PARSI JUDGE PICTURES ARE HUNG IN COURT ROOMS--HUGE ONES<br />\n<br />\nAT A SMALL SHRINE MEANT FOR CONVICTS TO PRAY BEFORE BEING SENTENCED TO DEATH OR JAIL-- THE PRIDE OF PLACE IS GIVEN TO SHIRDI SAI BABA -- A MARBLE STATUE. OTHER GODS IDOLS LIKE GANESHA, KRISHNA WERE DWARFED..<br />\n<br />\nI COULD SEE A DEMENTED OLD PARSI LAWYER TAKING THE ROUNDS.. HE WORE LAWYER ROBES -- HE HAD SEEN HALCYON DAYS<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS IN A BAD STATE , MORE THAN 85 YEARS OLD, WEARING WORN OUT HAWAAI CHAPPALS - I GUESS HE WAS ON A <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>REMINISCE TOUR </b></span>-- HIS HEAD SHAKING TO AND FRO.--DROOLING FROM THE CORNER OF HIS MOUTH<br />\n<br />\nI AM JUST SAYING &nbsp;2%-- I CAN WRITE A WHOLE BOOK .<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE LAW MINISTER WILL READ THIS , SO WILL CJI AND PM<br /><br />WHO CARES ?<br /><br />NOTHING WILL IMPROVE.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AT SHIP BOARD PARTIES MY CREW FORCED ME TO SING \"REMINISCE \" BY NEIL DIAMOND</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MY CREW SAYS , I SING BETTER THAN THE ORIGINAL.</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_66b+seedQysD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_66b+seedQysD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 115%;\">To keep you\nwarm when I was gone<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">I never knew<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">That near to\nyou's where I belong<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">I'd much\nrather stay<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">But I'll be\non my way<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">And never\nagain see you smile<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">But I'll be\non my way<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">And never\nagain see you smile<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">For all that\nit's worth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">I'd move\nheaven and earth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">To just\nreminisce for a while<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">We'll just\nreminisce for a while<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Books, movies, and\ntelevision often perpetuate the belief that circumstantial evidence may not be\nused to convict a criminal of a crime. But this view is nonsense<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most cases today,\ncircumstantial evidence is the only evidence linking an accused to a crime;\ndirect evidence may simply not exist.&nbsp; As\na result, the judge/ jury may have only circumstantial evidence to consider in\ndetermining whether to convict or acquit a person charged with a crime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. Supreme Court\nhas categorically ruled &nbsp;\"circumstantial evidence is intrinsically\nno different from testimonial [direct] evidence\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AS LONG AS WE HAVE STUPID LAWYER TURNED JUDGES IN INDIA -- DIRECT EVIDENCE &nbsp;WILL RULE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis now employed in criminal trials. &nbsp;&nbsp;Many\ncircumstances can create inferences about an accused's guilt in a criminal\nmatter, including rest; the presence of a motive or opportunity to commit the\ncrime; the accused's presence at the time and place of the crime; any denials,\nevasions, or contradictions on the part of the accused; and the general conduct\nof the accused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distinction between\ndirect and circumstantial evidence has little practical effect in the\npresentation or admissibility of evidence in trials. &nbsp;Circumstantial evidence is used in criminal\ncourts to decide the fate of accused by establishing guilt or innocence through\nreasoning. witnesses are the \"eyes and ears of justice\". &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But testimony of\nwitnesses is not always credible ( 90% of the time ) ; therefore, facts are\nprovable not only by witnesses but also by circumstances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Circumstantial evidence is used in criminal\ncourts to establish guilt or innocence through reasoning. &nbsp;They play an important role in civil courts to\nestablish or or deny liability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evidence\" is the\nraw material which a judge or adjudicator uses to reach \"findings of\nfact\". The findings of fact that the evidence generates are - for all\ntheir flaws - \"what happened\" for all intents and purposes of the\nlegal proceeding. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Circumstantial\nevidence\" however is not so much a type of evidence as it is a logical\nprinciple of deduction.&nbsp; Deduction is\nreasoning from general known principles to a specific proposition<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis unrelated facts that, when considered together, can be used to infer a\nconclusion about something unknown. &nbsp;Like\nhow weak strands make a strong &nbsp;rope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today all over the\nplanet successful criminal prosecutions rely largely on circumstantial\nevidence, and civil charges are frequently based on circumstantial or indirect\nevidence.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In practice,\ncircumstantial evidence often has an advantage over direct evidence in that it\nis more difficult to suppress or fabricate<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis evidence which strongly suggests something, but does not exactly prove it.&nbsp; Circumstantial evidence simply helps people\ndraw inferences about a fact, or the events that took place. &nbsp;Whether or not the judge or jury makes the\nintended inference has a major impact on the outcome of the case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">MOST INDIAN JUDGES\nDON\u2019T HAVE THE FUCKIN\u2019 BRAINS TO GLEAN CIRCUMSTANTIAL &nbsp;EVIDENCE</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qh8Wtqc6uT8/WIIDh_4MmAI/AAAAAAABQW4/xZN87PF_6ik_EF_Pb-vroSX4nrzDQcYNgCLcB/s1600/slid22e_4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qh8Wtqc6uT8/WIIDh_4MmAI/AAAAAAABQW4/xZN87PF_6ik_EF_Pb-vroSX4nrzDQcYNgCLcB/s640/slid22e_4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Facts that do not\nnecessarily prove a defendant\u2019s culpability, such as prior threats made to the\nvictim.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dick and Prick get into\na heated argument, during which Dick declares in front of a room full of\npeople, that he wanted to kill Prick. A week later, Prick is found murdered in\nhis back yard. Dick\u2019s declaration is not direct evidence that he committed the\ncrime, but it gives police a suspect. Many times another person John will\nmurder Prick just to screw Dick.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Digression:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I once held a party at\nanchorage , with some nearby ship captains ( &nbsp;batchmates and seniors etc ) and a Mallu\nLoading Master named Capt John were invited. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">John was from the ranks\u2014seaman\nto Captain \u2013up the hawse pipe, the hard way.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">One GORA captain asked\nme&nbsp; \u201c Captain, can I use your John\u201d . &nbsp;My wife was in the nedroom with other Captains\nwives and the toilet had to be accessed through the bed room<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration: none;\">July 24, 2013 at 5:43 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_0MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi blb,<br />\n<br />\nThe story is that drunken Prince Dipendra, killed nine members of his own family including his father King Birendra and mother Queen Aiswarya and committed suicide .<br />\n<br />\nWhile the entire families of Birendra and Dipendra were wiped out, nobody amongst Gyanendra's family died on 1 June 2001.<br />\n<br />\nGyanendra, out of town that night , was less popular than his brother Birendra, had been third in line to the throne before the massacre.<br />\n<br />\nThe dead were, King Birendra (father) / Queen Aiswarya (mother) / Prince Nirajan (brother) / Princess Shruti (sister) / Dhirendra (King Birendra's brother who had renounced his title) / Princess Jayanti (King Birendra's cousin) / Princess Shanti (King Birendra's sister) / Princess Sharada (King Birendra's sister) / Kumar Khadga (Princess Sharada's husband).<br />\n<br />\nA witness said that Prince Paras, son of now ousted King Gyanendra and cousin brother of Dipendra, came to the palace dinner party that night accompanied by a person wearing a Dipendra look-alike mask, who shot Dipendra dead first before other royal family members were killed.<br />\n<br />\nParas, is widely described as a violent and dangerous man, who has shot several people dead in brawls.<br />\n<br />\nAnd they crowned the dead Dipendra ( said to be in coma ) king for 3 days.<br />\n<br />\nSupriya Shah, the girl friend of Prince Dipendra , said that she had a talk with Dipendra hours before the massacre and he told her that he would call her later at night.<br />\nRoyal massacre always have deep external politics .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Dipendra was mortally wounded by a gunshot to the left side of the head, while Dipendra was right-handed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">These are things that killers do NOT plan in advance.</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_1b+seedEDd9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_1b+seedEDd9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN WROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS FRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS HE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED -- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL WHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO FAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;-- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT. HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT. AFTER THAT RAMANUJAN USED TO DO HIS WORK ON A SLATE , RUB IT OFF AND RETAIN RESULTS INSIDE HIS HEAD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
